import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Signup.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();// redirect after login
const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const[success,setSuccess]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){setSuccess(data.msg);setError("");// Store user info in localStorage/sessionStorage (for demo)
localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(data.user));// Redirect to a dashboard or home page
setTimeout(()=>navigate("/dashboard"),2000);}else{setError(data.msg||data.error);setSuccess("");}}catch(err){setError("Server error, try again later");setSuccess("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:"Noteflow"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Pick up your flow \u2014 log in now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",placeholder:"Enter your email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",placeholder:"Enter your password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-btn",children:"Login"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-msg",children:error}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"success-msg",children:success}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"footer-text",children:["Don't have account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sign-in",children:" Signup"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"noteflow2.png",alt:"noteflow",className:"team-img"})})]})});};export default Login;
